column3: Hirase is pondering what to make the Confederates for <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>dinner<Else/>breakfast</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>lunch<Else/>dinner</If></If>.
Obtain slabs of hearty gyuki meat from gyuki.
Deliver the slabs of hearty gyuki meat to Hirase.

Bah! You scared me! I was just contemplating what to make the hungry men and women of Onokoro for <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>dinner<Else/>breakfast</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>lunch<Else/>dinner</If></If>. As the resident chef, it is my responsibility to see that they are provided with good, nutritious meals.
I think today we will be having a pirate's stew. Makes your mouth water, doesn't it?

Problem is, I am missing a key ingredient. <sigh> Our revenue from the Ruby Tithe has been slowly declining and the treasurer has cut down on my budget. I am now unable to afford the juicy meat that makes this stew a proper pirate's stew.
Regardless, it is my job to find a way to keep our pirates healthy and full. That means I must find an alternative way to procure my meats. Perhaps you could assist me?
To the west of here are wild gyuki. Might you kill a few and bring me back slabs of this meat? In the meantime, I will go and search the sea for other foods to put into the stew.
Please bring back a few slabs of meat from the wild gyuki wandering to the west of here.
You have brought me back my meat? Fantastic! Simply fantastic! With this, my stew is now complete!
Do you smell that, my good <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lady<Else/>man</If>? Now, that is the smell of a proper meal!
Once we slide the hot stones into the pot, and the seawater begins to boil the seafood and meat, the already heavenly aroma will become all the sweeter!

We have the Ruby Sea to thank for such a luxurious bounty. By her we are blessed and in partaking of her food we shall be protected─unless you are foolish enough to swallow one of the hot stones, that is! Hahaha!
Thank you for your help, my friend. I hope this shall suffice as payment for your services.
